name: oj-rgbu-jraf-help-tile
description: A component that displays tiles for help content and can be rendered in the contextual area of the oj-rgbu-jraf-content-frame.

topics.description: An array of help topics to display. Help Topics have the following properties: name - The title of the topic; description - The description of the topic (Maximum 500 characters); url - The URL of the topic's content; type - The type of the topic's content. Valid options are 'document' and 'video'; imageSrc - An optional URL for a preview image to display on the topic; color - An optional color for the background of the topic's icon. The icon will be displayed if no preview image is provided. Valid colors are: lightblue, red, lightgreen, purple, blue, grey, orange, turquoise, and green
